text: Codigoro is a comune in the Province of Ferrara in the Emilia-Romagna region in Italy. == Main sights == * Abbey of Pomposa (9th century) * Bishop's Palace, restored in Venetian style in 1732 * Finance Tower (18th century) * Memorial to World War I Soldier, by Codigoro sculptor Mario Sarto == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Settlements in Ferrara
title: Codigoro
